text: If an uncaring asshole kills himself  is it a really a negative to the people around himListen  Imagine someone who s been lying and manipulating as far back as he can remember  Someone who stole from their  friend  because they wanted something that friend had  Someone who nearly got another person expelled because they found it funny  The person in question has trouble recalling when they felt a truly unselfish emotion   This someone is lazy  elitist  their friend described them as such just yesterday  and they agreed with the description  apathetic to everything in life  sexist and creepy  it s been told to his face on multiple occasions  with women  and spiteful of them too  for little reason  This person is a compulsive liar  and different people see him in drastically different lights  The person in question has made a fool of themself on multiple occasions  and people bring it up in jest amoung themselves  without letting the subject of their joking know what exactly happened  The reason why the subject doesn t know is because he was black out drunk  the black out was one of many   The person enjoys seeing other people miserable  and he feels like human scum  He doesn t show non coerced affection to his family  or his friends   What would the world lose if he decided to finally rid it of his presence  I can only see a gain

text: I m ready to kill myself  but I m still trying to find hopeI ve been planning for a while about how I was going to commit suicide  Today  I ve finally got my hands on everything I need  I planned on trying to kill myself tonight  My plan was to kill myself with carbon monoxide  also known as the  silent killer  More specifically on how I was going to do it  I planned on burning charcoal in a closed space I d breath in the poisonous smoke and eventually pass out and then die  It seems like a good way to go out  considering it s relatively painless  not messy  and it can kill in a matter of minutes or hours   I don t plan on doing it now though because my ex talked me out of it  He told me I should go to a mental hospital  but I told him they don t really work  I just feel the same   weeks after getting out of them anyways I thought I d just get this out there  If you re planning on commiting suicide  just know that you are always loved by somebody  and you leaving their lives forever will stick with them for the rest of their lives  However  I still want to end it sometimes too  so I understand  I can t say that life always gets better  but if you end yours  it certainly won t get any better either
summary: I was going to kill myself with carbon monoxide but my ex talked me out of it. He told me I should go to a mental hospital but I just feel the same weeks after getting out of them. If you are planning on committing suicide, know that you are always loved by somebody and leaving their lives forever will stick with them for the rest of their lives.
